eu_initiatives:
EU initiatives and legislative files in regard to deposit insurance, investor compensation schemes, crisis resolution etc.  
One current area of focus ist he Commissions Proposal for a regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council amending Regulation (EU) 806/2014 in order to establish a European Deposit Insurance Scheme,  as well as the further development of the practical application of the EU Directive on Deposit Guarantee Schemes in Member States and related work, e.g. cooperation with the European Banking Authority (EBA).
